com_addr: 台北市大安區仁愛路四段403號
com_name: 御香素食食品股份有限公司
job_desc: VERDE 是一家蔬食的概念餐廳，我們將在10月底帶給大家不同的飲食體驗，餐廳座位數為50位席，以現代西式餐飲風格，融入台灣各季節蔬菜，提供給客人對於蔬菜料理獨特的感受。目前我們正在尋找廚師團隊，希望能有西式烹飪經驗為佳，樂於學習，對於餐飲有濃厚興趣的廚師。Restaurant VERDE Taipei seeking kitchen staff.Verde is a vegetarian concept restaurant, opening at the end of October, offering an unforgettable dining experience. The restaurant can accommodate 50 covers. We aim to incorporate Western culinary techniques with Taiwan’s bountiful seasonal produce and ingredients, to create an experience unique to Taiwan.Currently, we are seeking enthusiastic kitchen staff, preferably with some professional kitchen experience, a willingness to learn, and a creativity that we hope to be able to foster.1.料理經驗5年以上2.管理人數5-8人3.確保食品符合安全衛生規定4.具備基本文書處理能力5.完成主廚交辦之任務6.執行物料管控
job_req:
全職
                            
                            日班、中班、夜班
work_exp: 需具備「相關經驗」，5年以上工作經驗
